judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Affirmed on the opinion of Mr. Justice Linn in the United Security Trust Company Case, 321 Pa. 276, costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edward M. Murphy, City Solicitor, for appellant.
John B. Brooks, with him Alban W. Curtme, Gerald F. Flood, Special Deputy Attorney General, and Charles J. Margiotti, Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Erie Trust Company’s Case
(No. 2).
Argued March 22, 1937.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Edward M. Murphy, City Solicitor, for appellant.
John B. Brooks, with him Alban W. Curtme, Gerald F. Flood, Special Deputy Attorney General, and Charles J. Margiotti, Attorney General, for appellee.
April 19, 1937:
